abstract: BUYING THE AIRWAVES Applications are due today from companies that want to bid on a valuable chunk of wireless spectrum that could be used to offer broadband data service. Google said on Friday that it was planning to bid. The Federal Communications Commission will not reveal information about the bids until mid-December.

Google said on Friday that it was planning to bid. The Federal Communications Commission will not reveal information about the bids until mid-December.
